summary: This document contains financial information related to the partnership Morgan Stanley Global Secondary Opportunities Fund II LP and its partner Blue Chip Capital LLC for the year 2012. It includes details on income, deductions, and credits as reported on Schedule K-1, which is used for tax purposes. This document contains various tax forms and schedules related to the financial activities of Blue Chip Capital LLC and Morgan Stanley Global Secondary Opportunities Fund II LP for the year 2012. It includes details on income distributions, tax credits, and partner shares of income and losses.
